Package by.roma.telecom.dao

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLUserDao
    public interface UserDao
    UserDao is the main interface to provide guidelines for User data manipulation and CRUD pathways.
    Since:
    10-18-2019
    Author:
    Roman

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      User authorization​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password)
      Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean User type object.
      User blockUser​(int id)
      Executes Update query, applies changes value to "true" in database column name isBlocked.
      User changePass​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String passOld, java.lang.String passNew)
      Executes Select and Update queries, assembles and returns updated bean User type object.
      User changeUserRole​(int id)
      Executes Update query, applies administrator rights to user with ID passed to the method.
      void deleteUser​(int id)
      Executes Delete query.
      java.util.List<User> getListOfAllUsers()
      Executes Select query, gathers all records of users from database except those that are marked as administrators.

    • Method Detail

      • authorization

        User authorization​(java.lang.String login,
                   java.lang.String password)
            throws DaoException
        Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean User type object.
        Parameters:
        login - User login as a String.
        password - User password as String.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • registration

        User registration​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String surname,
                  java.lang.String email,
                  java.lang.String addressL1,
                  java.lang.String addressL2,
                  java.lang.String addressL3,
                  java.lang.String pass)
           throws DaoException
        Executes Insert and Select queries, assembles and returns bean User type object.
        Parameters:
        name - User name as a String.
        surname - User surname as a String.
        email - User email as a String.
        addressL1 - User house/street address as a String.
        addressL2 - User city name as a String.
        addressL3 - User ZIP/Postal Code as a String.
        pass - User password as String with simple SHA-256Hex hashing applied prior.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

                java.lang.String addressL1,
                java.lang.String addressL2,
                java.lang.String addressL3)
         throws DaoException
        Executes Select and Update queries, assembles and returns updated bean object type User.
        Parameters:
        id - User id as an integer.
        name - User name as a String.
        surname - User surname as a String.
        email - User email as a String.
        addressL1 - User house/street address as a String.
        addressL2 - User city name as a String.
        addressL3 - User ZIP/Postal Code as a String.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • changePass

        User changePass​(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String passOld,
                java.lang.String passNew)
         throws DaoException
        Executes Select and Update queries, assembles and returns updated bean User type object.
        Parameters:
        id - User id as a String.
        passOld - User existing password as String with simple SHA-256Hex hashing applied prior.
        passNew - User new password as String with simple SHA-256Hex hashing applied prior.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • changeUserRole

        User changeUserRole​(int id)
             throws DaoException
        Executes Update query, applies administrator rights to user with ID passed to the method. Assembles and returns bean User type object.
        Parameters:
        id - User id as an integer.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • blockUser

        User blockUser​(int id)
        throws DaoException
        Executes Update query, applies changes value to "true" in database column name isBlocked. Blocked users unable to login into the web application. Assembles and returns updated bean User type object.
        Parameters:
        id - User id as an integer.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • unblockUser

        User unblockUser​(int id)
          throws DaoException
        Executes Update query, applies changes value to "false" in database column name isBlocked. Assembles and returns updated bean User type object.
        Parameters:
        id - User id as an integer.
        Returns:
        User type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • getListOfAllUsers

        java.util.List<User> getListOfAllUsers()
                                throws DaoException
        Executes Select query, gathers all records of users from database except those that are marked as administrators. Assembles a parameterized list type User, returns List type User.
        Returns:
        User type List.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • insertUserWithoutAI

        int insertUserWithoutAI​(int id,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String surname,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String addressL1,
                        java.lang.String addressL2,
                        java.lang.String addressL3,
                        java.lang.String pass,
                        boolean isAdmin,
                        boolean isBlocked)
                 throws DaoException
        Executes Insert query. Method used for ongoing or regressive testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        id - User name as an integer.
        name - User name as a String.
        surname - User surname as a String.
        email - User email as a String.
        addressL1 - User house/street address as a String.
        addressL2 - User city name as a String.
        addressL3 - User ZIP/Postal Code as a String.
        pass - User password as String.
        isAdmin - Administrator status as boolean.
        isBlocked - User block/unblock status as boolean.
        Returns:
        integer number from (Statement.RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS;) query.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • deleteUser

         throws DaoException
        Executes Delete query. Method used for ongoing or regressive testing purposes. Delete row from database with the an ID that is passed into the method.
        Parameters:
        id - User name as an integer.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.
